page.title: 04HEALTH/THE WATER SUPPLY (1)
page.content: The Gorbals Water Works was built in 1848 and is now the oldest water works in Europe .Water is pumped from here to supply Newton Mearns ,Darnley ,Nitshill ,Barrhead etc... Water is stored and gathered in four large reservoirs .They are Balgray ,Ryat Linn ,Waulkmill and Littleton .The reservoirs are connected by underground pipes and overflow channels .Large water valves control the flow of water to the works and when these are opened gravity sends the water from place to place . Major repairs were started in 1985 in preparation for a possible " 100 years flood ."
